sentences.sContent: Professor Antonio Golini is a demographer at the University of Rome.
sentences.sContent_eng: Professor Antonio Golini is a demographer at the University of Rome.
sentences.sCn: 罗马大学安东尼奥教授是位人口统计学家。

sentences.sContent: "I'm shaking to be honest, " said Stuart Gietel-Basten, an University of Oxford demographer who has argued for the end of the one-child policy.
sentences.sContent_eng: "I'm shaking to be honest, " said Stuart Gietel-Basten, an University of Oxford demographer who has argued for the end of the one-child policy.
sentences.sCn: “我真的非常震惊，”牛津大学人口统计学家斯图尔特·让泰尔-巴斯顿评论计划生育政策。

sentences.sContent: Professor Li Jianmin, a demographer at Nankai University, warns of the outlook for childless males. "Elder care for these single men will be a social problem, " he says.
sentences.sContent_eng: Professor Li Jianmin, a demographer at Nankai University, warns of the outlook for childless males. "Elder care for these single men will be a social problem, " he says.
sentences.sCn: 南开大学人口统计学家李建民教授警告说，无子女单身男性的晚景堪忧。“这些单身男人上了年纪后，如何照顾他们将成为一个社会问题。”

remMethod.val: demo(人民) + graph(写) + er → 人口统计学家

words.tran: 人口统计学的；人口学的
